description: A support network has launched to "inspire and support" Guernsey women to run for public office.
title: 'Not enough' women in Guernsey public life, support network says
title_page: 'Not enough' women in Guernsey public life, support network says - BBC News
maintext: Ms Green said it was not a problem of getting elected, as women were "just as likely" to be appointed as men if they put themselves forward.
